content: Property Asked by AnonymousAsked on 06 Jun 2019What will you choose - a private property in a good location (rent now and stay next year) OR getting a resale next year? We are a young couple with abt $9k combined salary1 answerAnswerBump0

WnkLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 07 Jun 2019Tough question! Personally, I will prefer my funds to go into paying down my own mortgage instead of someone else’s! So i will go for the latter! It’s a form of delayed gratification though, so one got to be alright with that!0 comments0
